name: Bladesinging
description: A fusion of swordplay and arcane artistry originating with the elves.

2.name: Training in War and Song
2.description: Gain proficiency with light armor, one type of one-handed melee weapon, and the Performance skill.

2.name: Bladesong
2.description: As a bonus action, start a Bladesong for 1 minute, gaining an AC bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier, +10 ft speed, advantage on Acrobatics, and a bonus to concentration saves equal to your Intelligence modifier. Uses equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

6.name: Extra Attack
6.description: Attack twice whenever you take the Attack action, and you can replace one attack with a cantrip.

10.name: Song of Defense
10.description: While your Bladesong is active, use a reaction to expend a spell slot and reduce incoming damage by five times the slot's level.

14.name: Song of Victory
14.description: While in a Bladesong, add your Intelligence modifier to the damage of your melee weapon attacks.
